attributes.action: Allow 2 people to visit their family members whilst they are in hospital
attributes.additional_details: You should do this as it may be the last time you see them
attributes.background: Allow family members to communicate in person with their family when they are in hospital

rejection.details:
Arrangements for hospital visits are operational decisions for individual NHS Trusts, not the Government or Parliament.

The NHS has stated that to help stop the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19), most hospitals have stopped or significantly limited visits. You can check the website for individual hospitals to find out what their advice is.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
